cs.IT, cs.CG, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.NA

Reasoning: The paper discusses the design of sensing matrices for sparse recovery of band-limited functions on the sphere and the rotation group. This involves topics such as compressed sensing, signal processing, and harmonic analysis, which are typically covered in the Information Theory (cs.IT), Computational Geometry (cs.CG), Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV), Machine Learning (cs.LG), and Numerical Analysis (cs.NA) sub-categories of arXiv CS.
